attributes.action: Declare Greenpeace a terrorist organisation and outlaw them.
attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned request that the group calling themselves "Greenpeace" are declared terrorists and outlawed in the United Kingdom.
Greenpeace use terror tactics to put people in fear of harm if they do not do what they are told to, just as any orthodox terrorist does.
Greenpeace promotes terror via disinformation, direct action and putting the public at risk because of such actions, (disrupting energy stability and promising death from global warming for example) therefore Greenpeace fits the very definition of a terror organisation and should be outlawed.
